verses.text: PEA tali ‘a Pilitati ko e matāpule Sua‘a ‘o pehē,
‘E tuku ‘afē ho‘omou ‘ai kupenga ke pō lea? Mou poto mu‘a, pea mau toki ava ke lea.
Ko e hā ‘oku lau ai kimautolu ko e manu? Ko e hā ‘oku mau hā ai kiate kimoutolu ko e ‘atamai si‘i?
‘A e manu fekai na ‘oku ke hae ‘e koe ‘a koe ‘i ho‘o ‘ita, ‘E tuku li‘aki koā ‘a māmani koe‘uhi ko koe? Mo hiki ‘a e makatu‘u mei hono potu?
Pehē ko e maama ‘a e angahala ‘e tāmate‘i, Pea ‘e ‘ikai mo‘ui ‘a e ulo ‘o ‘ene afi.
‘E fakapo‘uli ‘a e maama ‘aho ‘i hono tēniti, Pea ‘e tāmate‘i ‘ene maama tautau.
‘E fakapinepine ‘ene laka mālohi, Pea ‘oku lī ia ki lalo ‘e he‘ene fakakaukau ‘a‘ana.
He ‘oku fakateka ia ki he kupenga ‘e hono va‘e ‘o‘ona, Pea ‘oku ne ‘eve‘eva ‘i he funga hele.
‘Oku tou‘ia ha mui va‘e ha helepuna, ‘Oku mo‘ua hono sino ‘i ha helekete.
‘Oku fufū ‘i he kelekele ha hele va‘e mo‘ona, Mo e hele fakau‘u ki ai ‘i he hala papa.
‘Oku fakailifia‘i ia mei he potu kotoa pē ‘e he ngaahi ilifia, Pea nau molomolomuiva‘e ki ai ke faka‘ohovale‘i.
‘E hoko ‘o ‘alefa hono mala, Pea ‘oku ene hono tu‘utāmaki ke tulaki ia.
‘Oku kai ‘e he Me‘a ‘a e ngaahi fo‘i vākai ‘o hono kili, ‘Io, ko e ta‘okete ‘i he fāmili ‘o Mate, Te ne kai hono ngaahi kupu.
‘E ta‘aki mei hono tēniti ‘a e ngaahi me‘a na‘a ne falala ki ai, Pea ‘e taki ia kia Tu‘i Ha‘a Fakailifia.
‘E nofo ‘i hono tēniti ‘a e fa‘ahinga ‘oku ‘ikai ke kau kiate ia, Pea ‘e tupe‘i ‘a e sūlifa ki hono nofo‘anga.
‘I lalo ‘oku mōmoa hono aka, Pea ‘i ‘olunga, kuo tū‘ulu hono ngaahi va‘a.
Kuo mate ‘a e manatu ki ai mei he fonua, Pea ‘e ‘ikai lau hono hingoa ‘i he funga fonua ‘o tu‘a na.
Te nau kapusi ia mei he maama ki he po‘uli, Pea te nau sese‘e ia mei he nofo.
‘E ‘ikai hano pikilau, Pea ‘e ‘ikai ha hako ‘eiki ‘i hono kakai, Pea ‘e ‘ikai ‘ilo ha taha kuo hao ‘I he ngaahi potu kuo ne ‘āunofo ki ai.
Ko ha‘a nofo hihifo ‘e tumu ‘i he pehē hono ‘aho, Pea ko ha‘a nofo hahake ‘e mo‘utāfu‘ua.
Tala atu, ko e anga ia ‘o e nofo‘anga ‘o e kakai kovi, Pea ko e potu ‘o ha‘a ta‘e‘ilo kia ‘Ela.
